feature.name: Feature Which Fails
feature.description: This is a test feature with two scenarios which fail

scenario.name: Scenario Which Fails With Undefined Steps

step.action: I run a scenario with several steps
at least one step is undefined
the scenario will fail horribly
show up in red in the web agent html

scenario.name: Scenario Which Fails Due To Step Failure

a step fails an assertion

feature.name: Feature With Pending Passed And Failed Scenario
feature.description: This is a test feature a pending, passed and failed scenario. Feature state should end as Failed

step.action: I run a scenario with a single test step which passes
I run a scenario with several steps
one of the steps is marked pending
the subsequent steps are skipped
the scenario and feature finish in pending state

scenario.name: Scenario Which Fails With Undefined Steps

step.action: I run a scenario with several steps
at least one step is undefined
the scenario will fail horribly
show up in red in the web agent html

feature.name: Feature With Step Macro
feature.description: Test the behaviour when a scenario references a step macro

step.action: I call a step macro with two steps
I run step one
I run step two
I run step three
I call a step macro with a nested macro call
I call a step macro with two steps
I run step one
I run step two
I run step three
I run step four
I call a step macro with a failing step
I run step one
a step fails an assertion

feature.name: Feature Which Is Pending
feature.description: This is a test feature with a scenario which has pending steps. The scenario and feature should take on pending state

step.action: I run a scenario with several steps
one of the steps is marked pending
the subsequent steps are skipped
the scenario and feature finish in pending state

one of the steps throws a pending exception
